programme.title: Black Monday
programme.short_synopsis: Black Monday, and the need for radical federal deficit cuts.
programme.medium_synopsis: As the ripples still rebound following Black Monday, it's time for the British to take seriously the economic uncertainties, and for the US to agree cuts in the federal deficit.
